name: Bloomex-core-playwright-framework
description: Playwright framework for the automation of Bloomex

scripts.test:prod:en: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test
scripts.test:prod:fr: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test
scripts.test:prod:en:chromium: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test --project=Chromium
scripts.test:prod:fr:chromium: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test --project=Chromium
scripts.test:prod:en:firefox: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:prod:fr:firefox: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:prod:en:webkit: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test --project=webkit
scripts.test:prod:fr:webkit: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test --project=webkit
scripts.test:prod:en:edge: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test --project=edge
scripts.test:prod:fr:edge: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test --project=edge
scripts.test:prod:en:mobile-chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test --project='Mobile Chrome'
scripts.test:prod:fr:mobile-chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test --project='Mobile Chrome'
scripts.test:prod:en:mobile-safari: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test --project='Mobile Safari'
scripts.test:prod:fr:mobile-safari: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod && cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test --project='Mobile Safari'
scripts.test:prod:clean:en: npm run clean:allure && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod cross-env NODE_locale=en npx playwright test || echo 'Test run has failures. Check the report for details.'
scripts.test:prod:clean:fr: npm run clean:allure && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod cross-env NODE_locale=fr npx playwright test || echo 'Test run has failures. Check the report for details.'
scripts.allure:generate: npm run allure:copy:history && allure generate allure-results --clean
scripts.test:prod:allure:en: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:prod:clean:en allure:generate
scripts.test:prod:allure:fr: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:prod:clean:fr allure:generate
scripts.test:prod:allure:open:en: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:prod:clean:en allure:generate allure:open
scripts.test:prod:allure:open:fr: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:prod:clean:fr allure:generate allure:open

author: Bloomex
